item.author: kurosawa7620@gmail.com (d-kuro)
item.description: Want to do None Achievement None Diary Learn more about Kubernetes certificates Note Accessing Kubelet API https://gist.github.com/lizrice/c32740fac51db2a5518f06c3dae4944f Kubelet の API にアクセスする Is there API documentation for Kubelet API https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35075195/is-there-api-documentation-for-kubelet-api Kubelet の API のドキュメントはないよってやつ Attacking Kubernetes through Kubelet https://labs.f-secure.com/blog/attacking-kubernetes-through-kubelet/ Kubelet の API で Pod への exec ができる
